title: How farmer's in India's Sundarbans area are using climate smart agriculture

tasks.task: Arriving at Bongeri village post-cyclone devastation
subtasks: Driving for hours to locate Bongeri village
Assessing the post-cyclone disaster area (South 24th Parganas, West Bengal)
Learning about the region's struggle due to 2009 Cyclone Islay

tasks.task: Participating in the National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture project
subtasks: Joining the pilot project in Bongeri village
Dealing with initial challenges (waterlogged, unable to grow crops)
Promoting agroforestry (combining trees and shrubs with crops)
Managing water usage and nutrition costs
Providing training on soil testing and minimizing chemical inputs
Adapting to local conditions and utilizing native plant species
Visiting flourishing farms and aquaculture sites
Noticing improved living standards (new homes, orphans' well-being)
Evaluating the project's effectiveness as a government success case
